>.name: cancel
>.desc: Cancel into the next command. before the recovery animation of the current command.

>.name: follow-up
>.desc: Perform the next command after the recovery animation of the current command.

>.name: immedate
>.desc: Immediately perform the next command, without completing the previous command.

>.name: landing cancel
>.desc: Perform this command after landing from your jump.

>.name: homing jump
>.desc: Use a homing jump follow up.

motions.name: half-circle forward
motions.desc: Perform a half circle motion on your stick or pad, starting at the back.

motions.name: half-circle back
motions.desc: Perform a half circle motion on your stick or pad, starting at the front.

motions.name: quarter-circle forward
motions.desc: Perform a quarter circle motion towards the front on your stick or pad, starting at the bottom.

motions.name: quarter-circle back
motions.desc: Perform a quarter circle motion towards the back on your stick or pad, starting at the bottom.

motions.name: dragon punch
motions.desc: Perform the following motion: forward, down, then down-forward.

motions.name: back dragon punch
motions.desc: Perform the following motion: back, down, then down-back.

directions.name: neutral
directions.desc: Keep the stick or d-pad at neutral position.
